Package user

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • user.Payment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PaymentStd, PaymentVlibre, PaymentVmax
    public abstract class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class representing a payment regime for an user. It was implemented to ensure the strategy design pattern for getting the value of the rents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Payment​(java.time.LocalDateTime start)
      Initializes a Payment object and saves in it the starting time of the rent operation, so that final value can be easily deduced

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      Gets the value of the time discount that can be used for one ride when it applies.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Payment

        public Payment​(java.time.LocalDateTime start)
        Initializes a Payment object and saves in it the starting time of the rent operation, so that final value can be easily deduced
        Parameters:
        start - LocalDateTime object for the time the bike was rented.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public abstract double getValue​(java.time.LocalDateTime end_time)
        Method that gets the correct price of the bike rent
        Parameters:
        end_time - LocalDateTime object for the return of the bike.
        Returns:
        Double with the price of the bike rental.

      • getTimeDiscount

        public long getTimeDiscount​(java.time.LocalDateTime end_time)
        Gets the value of the time discount that can be used for one ride when it applies. By default it returns zero. See PaymentVlibre to see how it is overriden.
        Parameters:
        end_time - LocalDateTime object for the return of the bike.
        Returns:
        Integer with the number of minutes to be used in discount

      • createAdequatePayment

        public static Payment createAdequatePayment​(User usr,
                                            Bike bike,
                                            java.time.LocalDateTime time)
        Static method for generating the correct payment class. It is intended to be so that the Payment abstract class acts as a factory for generating correct payment regimes following the factory pattern
        Parameters:
        usr - User instance that is renting the bike
        bike - Bike instance being rented
        time - LocalDateTime with time of rental
        Returns:
        Payment instance with adequate payment regime

      • getStartTime

        public java.time.LocalDateTime getStartTime()

      • setStartTime

        public void setStartTime​(java.time.LocalDateTime rent_start_time)
